meanings.definition: The quality or state of being marvelous.
meanings.sent1: The marvelousnesses of the sunset filled her with joy.
meanings.sent2: She admired the marvelousnesses of the colorful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The children's laughter added a touch of marvelousnesses to the quiet library.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of marvelousnesses in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The magical land was full of marvelousnesses at every turn.

meanings.definition: The marvelous or wonderful aspects or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: The book highlighted the marvelousnesses of friendship and loyalty.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the marvelousnesses of nature during her hike.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected gift brought a sense of marvelousnesses to her day.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with the marvelousnesses of hope and inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The music concert was a celebration of artistic marvelousnesses.
